item.title: Netmarc: Personal Indexes on the Internet
item.description: Explore the project live: https://netmarc.vercel.app/ NetMarc is a powerful, customizable tool designed to tailor your search experience based on your needs. Whether you’re a student, a developer, a business professional, or just browsing the web, NetMarc provides a focused and efficient way to find the information you need. The Tech Stack Frontend (Vercel): The user interface is built with ReactJS, a popular JavaScript library known for its component-based architecture and efficient rendering.

item.title: Building DBola for rapid prototyping database applications
Tricks
item.description: Find the number of digits in a number - Optimal Solution : The logarithmic base 10 of a positive integers gives the number of digits in n. We add 1 to the result to ensure that the count is correct even for numbers that are powers of 10. public class pattern9 { public static void main(String args[]){ int n = 89765; int val = (int)(Math.log10(n))+1; System.out.print("For "+n+" the number of digits is: "+val); } } Finding the signed right shift (by 1,2,3…) : So, for a decimal number (ex: 120), the values will be the integer division by 2 at each consecutive step.
